column4: ɔwo a annwo; ɔwo a ennkyeem ɔba da
column6: na tsea mu: na ankonam no ne mba bɔdɔɔ so asen ɔbaa ɔwarfo no ne mba

column3: na tserɛtserɛw wo tsenabea ho nkataho tam no mu; mma nnkam do: twetwe wo ntampehoma no mu

column2: "Na ebɛtserɛw akɔ enyimfa na abankum; na w'asefo bɛfa amanaman no ayɛ hɔndze
column3: na wɔama wɔatsenatsena ekurofo no do."

column2: "Mma nnsuro; na w'enyi ronnto; eso mma w'enyim nngu ase; na wɔrennhyɛ wo enyito: na wo werɛ befir wo mbofraber mu enyito
column3: na ennkɛkaa w'ekunayɛ mu adapaabɔ ara bio."

column2: "Na wo Bɔfo nye wo kun; ne dzin dze dɔm EWURADZE: na Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no nye wo pomfo: wɔbɛfrɛ no asaase nyinara Nyankopɔn."
"Na EWURADZE afrɛ wo dɛ ɔyer a wɔapow no na ɔyaw ekitsa no wɔ sunsum mu
"Mber tsiabaa bi na madan wo egya; na ehumbɔbɔr kɛse na medze bɔboa w'ano."
"Ebufuw mbordo mu na medze m'enyim huntsaa wo kakra; na ɔdomankoma ayamuyie na medze mubohu wo mbɔbɔr
"Na iyi yɛ me dɛ Noa esu no; na dɛ mbrɛ maka ntam dɛ Noa esu no remmpram asaase do bio no
column3: dɛmara so na maka ntam dɛ mo bo nnkofuw wo
na akoko atwetwe hɔnho; naaso modɔ a otsim dze
column5: eso m'asomdwee ahyɛmudzi no ronntwe noho
column6: EWURADZE a ohu wo mbɔbɔr no na ɔse."

column2: "Ao ɔwo amandzehunyi a ehum etu wo
column5: medze w'abo mibesisi wo ntɔnka dubir mu
column6: na medze hoabo atow wo fapem."

column4: na abo fɛɛfɛw a ɔsom bo ayɛ wo kurotsia nyina."

column2: "Na wo mba nyinara EWURADZE bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; na wo mba hɔn asomdwee bɔdɔɔ so."
"Ndzeyɛtsenenee mu na wobetsim wo: enye nhyɛdo ntamu bɔtwe
column3: osiandɛ innkosuro; enye ehuyi ntamu twe

column4: ɔnnam mo do: obiara a obohuenyan basabasayɛ etsia wo no

column3: emi na mabɔ ɔtomfo a ohutsa ogyabiriw mu
column4: na ɔbɔ akodze pue; na emi mara so na mabɔ ɔsɛɛfo dɛ ɔnsɛɛ no."

column2: "Akodze biara a wɔbɔ tsia wo no
column3: ɔrennyɛ yie: na tɛkyerɛma biara a ɔbɔsoɛr etsia wo wɔ atsɛmbu mu no
column4: ibobu no fɔ. Iyi nye EWURADZE no nkowaa hɔn egyapadze
column5: na hɔn tsenenee a ofi emi mara
